name: 黃秀英
objective:
Prerequisites: None.
This course introduces the principles followed during the movement of mechanical systems and the transmission of forces among parts. The main systems will be covered in the course including the linkage systems, cams, gears, pure-rolling systems, sprocket wheels, belts, and roller drive sets.
(Taught in English)
